title: Add Remember Me Feature
description: Implement a 'Remember Me' checkbox that keeps users logged in across app restarts.
instructions:
Add a 'Remember Me' feature to the login screen that:

1. Shows a checkbox on the login form
2. When checked, persists the session token securely
3. When unchecked, clears tokens on app close
4. Auto-fills the email field if remembered
5. Respects user's choice on subsequent logins

The implementation should:
- Store the preference in secure storage
- Optionally remember the email for convenience
- Clear session appropriately based on the setting
- Work with both email/password and OAuth login

hints.text: Add a CheckboxListTile to the login form and a boolean state variable to track the preference.
Store the email in secure storage when remember me is checked, and load it in initState.
When remember me is unchecked, you can either not store tokens at all (session-only) or store them but clear on explicit logout.
